plan_summary: With SquareMeal, you're rewarded for eating out. Go to our website, book selected restaurants, and you'll collect points every time you spend £20 or more. You can easily redeem points on our website for restaurant vouchers & luxury gifts.
plan_description: Join SquareMeal Rewards today to make your next dinner even more rewarding. As a member, you'll earn points for booking tables, leaving restaurant reviews, and each time you spend £20 or more in one of our selected restaurants with your linked payment cards. 100 points = £1 spend on your choice of restaurant vouchers, luxury gifts, or charity donations. To book a table or redeem rewards, simply go to our website.
redeem_instructions: Only accounts with linked payment cards will receive SquareMeal Rewards Points, when you make a qualifying purchase in a participating restaurant.
